result.reason: This is a scoped enhancement request and the codebase already exposes multiple user field properties, so external-app token expansion can be extended safely.
result.approach: Extend token parsing to support %USERFIELD1% through %USERFIELD10%, add NUnit coverage for each token and escape mode, and update external-tools variable docs.
